feedback.description: Tell me what do you think of the bot, report bugs, etc...
examples: feedback There is a bug when we run the support command :x

guide.description: Get help on using main Homer features

help.description: Get help on using the bot

invite.description: Invite the bot on your server

support.description: Join the support server to get help on using the bot

translations.description: Get the list of available languages for Homer

vote.description: Vote instructions and see who voted the most this month

channel.description: Get information on a text channel

checkdbans.description: Checks if a user ID is listed on the Discord Bans list (unofficial)

examples: google What's the best way to import a Python module ?

lookup.description: Search for guilds, users and invites through Discord

translate.description: Translate the provided text into the given language

weather.description: Get the current weather for the given location

examples: afk I'm doing my homework, see you later!

names.description: Search for previous names of user

examples: poll What do you prefer ? -d A: McDonald's - B: Quick -e :regional_indicator_a: :regional_indicator_b: -t 1h -c GREEN

profile.description: Create or edit your profile, get people profiles or see what are the available fields

quote.description: Fetch a message using its ID and display it

remind.description: Reminds you of tasks you set

say.description: Repeat what you told to the bot
examples: say I am the best bot ever created, pst.. it's wrong but don't tell anyone!

category.description: Disable a command category for the server

format.description: Set a date or a time format for the guild

ignore.description: Make the bot ignore or listen to a channel

locale.description: Set a locale for the guild

settimezone.description: Set a timezone for the guild

examples: welcome Oh yeah, {user.tag} just entered the place!

callmsg.description: Set a custom message shown during incoming calls or reset it
examples: callmsg @b1nzy Here is a call for you!

phonebook.description: Search for telephone numbers in the phonebook

setphone.description: Set-up the telephone channel or reset it

ban.description: Bans a member from the server

case.description: Get infomation about a moderation case

clear.description: Clear messages using the given criteria

hackban.description: Hackbans a member from the server

kick.description: Kicks a member from the server

modlog.description: Set-up a modlog channel or reset it

reason.description: Edits the reason of a moderation case
examples: reason 4 Actually it's because he wasn't clever

tempban.description: Bans a member from the server for the specified time

unban.description: Unbans a user from the server
examples: unban b1nzy#1337 He was nice actually
